content.description: The following question refers to the topic of the Second World War.
content.question: The devastating impact of the Second World War on civilian populations in Europe is best understood in the context of

choices.label: the much longer duration of the war compared to that of the First World War
the mobilization of women as industrial workers for war production
the development of new technologies that enabled long-range attacks on enemy cities
the stalemate that resulted from the emergence of trench warfare

content.answer: the development of new technologies that enabled long-range attacks on enemy cities

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
